name: Plantcore
description: Plantcore is a tight 2D exploration platformer. You play as a little, cuddly creature and explore an open world in which many different kinds of plants are growing. These plants grant you new abilities and by cleverly using them, you will be able to discover the holy stone tablets which provide you divine powers. But you have to be careful, becoming a god is dangerous and there are threats that you will never have seen before in a videogame..
